definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
luxuriant/buxom/variant of 豐|丰[feng1]/variant of 風|风[feng1]/appearance/charm

sentences.english: And equipped with more than a decade has experienced drivers.
sentences.chinese: 并配备有十年以上驾龄，经验丰富的司机。

sentences.english: Use well-experienced practitioners to act at the top management level.
sentences.chinese: 使用经验丰富的专业人员担当高层管理角色。

sentences.english: Example : Obama's chief China advisor is an experienced China hand.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马的首席中国问题顾问是个经验丰富的中国通。

sentences.english: The company has great strength and abundant supply of experienced managers.
sentences.chinese: 公司实力雄厚，货源充足，拥有经验丰富的管理人员。

sentences.english: Man cook wanted. Must be thoroughly experienced and English-speaking.
sentences.chinese: 诚聘男厨师一名，经验丰富，能说英语为佳。

sentences.english: Place international shipping information where experienced users look for it.
sentences.chinese: 广场国际航运信息的用户那里经验丰富的检查。

sentences.english: There are over 100 strictly-trained workers with many years of experiences.
sentences.chinese: 本厂职工均经过严格培训，且经验丰富。

sentences.english: He was as experienced as his brother was green.
sentences.chinese: 他经验丰富，而他兄弟却涉世未深。

sentences.english: I expect you to seek guidance from some of our seasoned managers.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你能从经验丰富的经理那寻求些指导。

sentences.english: Peter has experience in assisting foreign enterprises to invest in China.
sentences.chinese: 龚永德在协助国外企业来华投资的经验丰富。

sentences.english: Once the vastly more experienced Yugoslavia stopped laughing, they rattled in four themselves to progress to the next round.
sentences.chinese: 经验丰富的南斯拉夫队趁机又连进四球，挺进下一轮。

sentences.english: The experience of our side and the youthful determination of the other balance each other out.
sentences.chinese: 我方经验丰富，对方年轻气盛决心大，两者不相上下。

sentences.english: Liu experienced, particularly the "typhoid fever" in-depth research.
sentences.chinese: 刘老经验丰富，尤对《伤寒论》有深入的研究。
他们说“条件太好了”，你可以说是“经验丰富的”。

sentences.english: Miss Yang is an experienced English teacher.
sentences.chinese: 杨老师是一名经验丰富的英文老师。

sentences.english: Bridgitte Lin Ching Hsia is a veteran actress.
sentences.chinese: 林青霞是个银幕表演经验丰富的演员。

definition: experienced person/an old hand at sth
lit. veteran of a hundred battles (idiom)/fig. experienced/seasoned
special duty/assigned full time to a task
switch to a job one was not trained for
to be good at/to be expert in
